alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Hardeman (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 9:55AM CDT until July 01 at 10:45AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Marshall County in northwestern Mississippi... Northern Benton County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Fayette County in west Tennessee... Southwestern Hardeman County in west Tennessee... * Until 1045 AM CDT. * At 955 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Mt Pleasant, or 12 miles southeast of Collierville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lamar, Somerville, Mt Pleasant, Lagrange, Michigan City, Slayden, Macon, Piperton, Rossville, Moscow, Williston, Grand Junction, La Grange, Hickory Valley, Saulsbury, Cayce, Taylor Chapel, Taska, Pattersonville and Van Buren. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
